import-steps:
<import-step id="-GS-dependencies" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installGSDependencies" title="Dependend GS profiles for " version="">
Install Generic Setup profile dependencies for
<import-step id="-QI-dependencies" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installQIDependencies" title="Dependend QI installables for " version=""> <dependency step="-GS-dependencies"/> Install quickinstaller dependencies for
<import-step id="-Hide-Tools-From-Navigation" handler="Products..setuphandlers.setupHideToolsFromNavigation" title="Hide Custom tools from Navigation for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Hides custom tools from navigation tree for
<import-step id="-Import-Relations" handler="Products..setuphandlers.installRelations" title="Install Relations for " version=""> <dependency step="-QI-dependencies"/> Installs the relations.xml file into relations library for
